Description:
Identifies when an account hasn't signed in during the past n number of days.

Author: Mark Morowczynski '@markmorow', Gloria Lee, '@gleeiamglo'
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Stale Accounts In A Privileged Role
Query: sourcetype='azure-pim' eql select * from _source_ where riskeventtype = 'stalesigninalertincident'
